function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using blockchain to associate people's official IDs with COVID-19 status and movement permissions","Impact":"Potential privacy concerns, data security risks, and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, encryption protocols, and user consent policies","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption protocols","People":"Users, individuals with COVID-19, government authorities","Owner":"Start-up, government authorities"},{"Description":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","Impact":"Privacy and security risks, potential misuse of health and location data","Mitigation":"Implement strong data security measures, user consent policies, and access controls","Technologies":"Hyperledger Fabric, IBM blockchain, IBM cloud platforms","People":"Medical organizations, public health officials, individuals","Owner":"MiPasa, medical organizations, public health authorities"}]}
